source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Blender & Substance: Modeling and texturing videogame props
items.headline: Learn the complete workflow of the models for videogames and create ¡five assets! using Blender and Substance Painter
objectives_summary: Blender 2.8x fundamentals and principal modeling tools
All the modeling workflow for videogames
Optimization for videogames

items.title: Mantaflow Fluid Simulation Guide in Blender
items.headline: Learn Everything there is to know about Blender 3D's Fluid Simulation.
objectives_summary: You learn all about the fluid simulation in Blender
You will be able to create your own simulations completely on your own
You will learn how to render realistic fluid in Eevee and Cycles

items.title: Jewellery Design in Rhino

visible_instructors.name: Hamed
visible_instructors.title: Hamed Arab
visible_instructors.job_title: Jewellery CAD Designer, Jeweller and Instructor

items.headline: Fundamental Jewellery Designing Techniques in Rhino 3D
objectives_summary: Design CAD models within the metrics of scale, proportion and element relationships
Get to know Jewellery techniques for designing  jewellery with computer and CAD software
Learn Rhino from basic

items.title: Game Asset Creation With Houdini
items.headline: 3D Modelling in Houdini
objectives_summary: Create a game ready asset using Houdini's procedural workflow

items.title: Getting Started with 3D Printing
items.headline: Learn the basics of 3D Modeling to create real objects using your 3D Printer or a 3D Printing Service.
objectives_summary: Learn basics of Creating 3D Models to build real world objects
Learn OpenSCAD basics (code to make 3D Models)
Learn 123DMake Basics (by Autodesk)

items.title: 3D in After Effects CC: Working & Animating in 3D Space

visible_instructors.name: Louay
visible_instructors.title: Louay Zambarakji
visible_instructors.job_title: Motion Graphics / Visual Effects / Video Editing

items.headline: Adobe After Effects CC: A complete guide to Animating in After Effects 3D Space and using Cameras, Lights and Shadows...
objectives_summary: How to Create and Animate in After Effects 3D Space
How to work with 3D Cameras
How to use 3D views to create a 3D Motion Path

items.title: Creating modular environments
items.headline: This course teaches you to build modularly and apply it in a large landscape
objectives_summary: Making modular buildings with modular objects
Creating a large environment Terrain
Working with light and atmosphere

items.title: Maya 2017 Quickstart - Create a Low poly scene for Beginners
items.headline: Create your own 3d world using Maya 2017 in this fun project based course
objectives_summary: Navigate in the Maya viewports
Select and deselect objects
Use the move, rotate and scale tools

items.title: Make a low poly scene in Blender and Unity in 30 minutes

visible_instructors.name: John
visible_instructors.title: John Bura
visible_instructors.job_title: Best Selling Instructor Web/App/Game Developer 700k Students

items.headline: Learn something new in just 30 minutes! Learn how to make low poly art in blender!
objectives_summary: Learn how to make 2 models in Blender
Import them to Unity3D

items.title: Blender Unleashed: Master 3d Fundamentals Quickly
items.headline: Expert training on navigation, modeling, texturing, lighting, and rendering in Blender 2.7x. No fluff just results!
objectives_summary: I will teach you a process for generating professional 3d graphics quickly and effectively in Blender.
You will learn to model, texture, light, and render a 3d scene from beginning to end.
I will provide you with tips I've picked up along my past 12 years with the software saving you time and frustration.

items.title: After Effects CC: 2D Character Animation - Puppet & Rig

visible_instructors.name: Louay
visible_instructors.title: Louay Zambarakji
visible_instructors.job_title: Motion Graphics / Visual Effects / Video Editing

items.headline: Adobe After Effects CC - Master the two most important techniques for 2D animations in Adobe After Effects.
objectives_summary: Create 2D Character Animation using the two most important methods
Master the Puppet Pin Tool and all its auxiliary tools
Identify strategic placement of Pins

items.title: Character Animation with Blender for Beginners
items.headline: The complete beginners guide to animating 3D characters
objectives_summary: understand the process of 3D character animation
create more believable and realistic character animation
animate characters for film and game projects

items.title: 3D Animation & Modeling Master Class | Beginner to Advanced

visible_instructors.name: [ School of Game Design
visible_instructors.title: [ School of Game Design ]
visible_instructors.job_title: Real world training from game design experts!

items.headline: Computer animation, modeling, texturing, and rendering! Learn Maya, 3DSMax, Mudbox, or apply your new skills to Blender
objectives_summary: Animation, Polygon Modeling, Texturing, Rigging, Lighting, Digital Sculpting, Rendering
Master Maya, 3DSMax, Mudbox, and techniques you can use in any 3D application!
Create professional quality assets for your portfolios, games, and animations. Create your own 3D prints or VR worlds

items.title: Learn Adobe Character Animator CC
items.headline: Motion Capture Animation Basics
objectives_summary: Create their own motion capture puppets using Adobe Character Animator and Photoshop
Set physics on their animated puppets
Record voiceover or sync pre-existing dialogue to their puppet's mouths

items.title: Background Design - Landscapes and Environments
items.headline: Create Concept Art and Digital Paintings for Film, Animation or Games
objectives_summary: In this course, you will learn how to create concept art
You'll learn to paint backgrounds for films, animation or games
You'll learn about key principles of composition

items.title: Advanced Storyboarding for Film & Animation
items.headline: Become a Storyboard Artist, learn professional skills for story boarding for Film, Animation & Gaming
objectives_summary: You'll learn how to draw storyboards for a script, and how to visually tell a story in the clearest possible way
You'll learn about story beats, how to break down a script and how to choose the right shots and camera angles
You will learn what gesture drawing is and what it isn't; and how to draw dynamic characters
